name: Coin Pusher (itch) (xtase studios)
description:
Coin pusher, where you need to collect food to feed your fighters and farmers.

Every round you have to feed your fighters and farmers. If you don't feed them they will be dropped back.

Fighters will take out enemies. When you have no fighters left, enemies will:

  1. take keys/chests
  2. kill farmers
  3. take 2 food

Farmers will give one additional food.

Opening chests give you 5 food.
